description: A cylindrical standoff mount 20mm high with a 12mm diameter base and a 6mm diameter threaded hole through the center.
code:
import cadquery as cq

result = (
    cq.Workplane("XY")
    .circle(6)
    .extrude(20)
    .faces(">Z")
    .workplane()
    .hole(6)
    .faces("<Z")
    .workplane()
    .circle(12)
    .extrude(2)
)
prompt: A cylindrical standoff mount 20mm high with a 12mm diameter base and a 6mm diameter threaded hole through the center.
